刪剪.definition: to cut (from a movie etc); to censor

刪改.definition: to edit; to modify; to alter (written material)

刪減.definition: to abridge (a text); to edit out (of a movie); to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)

刪節.definition: to abridge; to cut a text down to size for publication

刪簡壓縮.definition: to simplify and condense (a text); abridged
